Package net.mtrop.doom.map.udmf.attributes

Interface UDMFZDoomSidedefAttributes

All Superinterfaces:
UDMFDoomSidedefAttributes
public interface UDMFZDoomSidedefAttributes
extends UDMFDoomSidedefAttributes
Contains sidedef attributes for ZDoom namespaces.
Since:
2.9.0
Author:
Matthew Tropiano

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static String ATTRIB_COMMENT
    Object comment.
    static String ATTRIB_FLAG_CLIP_MIDTEX
    Sidedef flag: This side's middle texture is clipped by the floor.
    static String ATTRIB_FLAG_LIGHT_ABSOLUTE
    Sidedef flag: Relative sidedef light level is instead absolute.
    static String ATTRIB_FLAG_LIGHT_FOG
    Sidedef flag: Use light level in fog.
    static String ATTRIB_FLAG_NO_DECALS
    Sidedef flag: Disable decals on this wall.
    static String ATTRIB_FLAG_NO_FAKE_CONTRAST
    Sidedef flag: Disable the "fake contrast" on angled walls.
    static String ATTRIB_FLAG_SMOOTH_LIGHTING
    Sidedef flag: Disable the "fake contrast" on angled walls.
    static String ATTRIB_FLAG_WRAP_MIDTEX
    Sidedef flag: This side's middle texture is wrapped vertically if there is more to draw.
    static String ATTRIB_LIGHT
    Sidedef relative light level.
    static String ATTRIB_OFFSET_BOTTOM_X
    Sidedef bottom texture offset, X.
    static String ATTRIB_OFFSET_BOTTOM_Y
    Sidedef bottom texture offset, Y.
    static String ATTRIB_OFFSET_MIDDLE_X
    Sidedef middle texture offset, X.
    static String ATTRIB_OFFSET_MIDDLE_Y
    Sidedef middle texture offset, Y.
    static String ATTRIB_OFFSET_TOP_X
    Sidedef upper texture offset, X.
    static String ATTRIB_OFFSET_TOP_Y
    Sidedef upper texture offset, Y.
    static String ATTRIB_OFFSET_X
    Sidedef base texture offset X.
    static String ATTRIB_OFFSET_Y
    Sidedef base texture offset Y.
    static String ATTRIB_SCALE_BOTTOM_X
    Sidedef bottom texture scaling, X.
    static String ATTRIB_SCALE_BOTTOM_Y
    Sidedef bottom texture scaling, Y.
    static String ATTRIB_SCALE_MIDDLE_X
    Sidedef middle texture scaling, X.
    static String ATTRIB_SCALE_MIDDLE_Y
    Sidedef middle texture scaling, Y.
    static String ATTRIB_SCALE_TOP_X
    Sidedef upper texture scaling, X.
    static String ATTRIB_SCALE_TOP_Y
    Sidedef upper texture scaling, Y.
    static String ATTRIB_SECTOR_INDEX
    Sidedef sector reference.
    static String ATTRIB_TEXTURE_BOTTOM
    Sidedef bottom texture.
    static String ATTRIB_TEXTURE_MIDDLE
    Sidedef middle texture.
    static String ATTRIB_TEXTURE_TOP
    Sidedef top texture.
